commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Here's to the success of the Summer Festival!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Cheers!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: *Glug* *Glug* Ah, that's good! It really hits the spot!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Nothing beats a cold drink after working up a sweat!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: You two sound like old men, not high school girls.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Everyone! Let's relax tonight! Drink up, sing, and get wild!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Partying is fine, but please don't forget that there are other guests in the ryokan. Please keep the excitement to a reasonable level!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Okay!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: That was too loud!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: You're being just as loud as us.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I feel like this has happened before.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: This golden, fizzy drink... Is it that classic party drink that you pop off the cork of?!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Eeek! Oh no, I drank it even though I'm underage!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Don't worry! It's nonalcoholic apple ginger ale. Drink as much as you want.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: You should know by the smell of it. Besides, it was in a plastic bottle. I opened it right in front of you.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Let's open the food cart stuff! We got yakitori, fried chicken, okonomiyaki, hot dogs, castellas, chocolate bananas...

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: You sure bought a lot.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Hey, do you still have that camera from this afternoon? I want to see the pictures you took.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Sure, here you go. I hope they came out all right.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: *Giggle* Let's see! Oh, it's the mikoshi shrine! You got so close to it.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I think that's zoomed in. I doubt you can actually get that close to it.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: The next one is...oh, the shagiri concert!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I've never seen anything like that, but it was so exciting. It made me want to move my feet.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Your body just moves to the rhythm when you hear the beating of those drums.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Oh, this is the Bon dance contest, zura. Kanan and Mari are in this photo.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: It was incredible.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: You had some nice dance moves, too.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ahaha, I guess... I felt like I had two left feet though.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I can hear the voices of everyone having fun in every picture.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: This is the picture we took with everyone before the show.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: *Giggle* You look kind of tense.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: I told you to smile.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: B-But, I didn't think I'd be in the picture, too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That live show was so moving. The audience was so excited, too. Lots of people really love you guys.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: You think that's true? I'm glad.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Shine...

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Hm?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You said when we first met that the Summer Festival would give you a hint to what your own way to shine is.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Did you find it?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: ...Nope.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: The Summer Festival was a blast. I was so sad when they said it was canceled, but we worked hard and pulled it off.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: It felt like everyone that came to watch was connected deeply in their hearts, too. It's amazing.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: But as for our own way to shine... I didn't see it this time, hehehe.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: It's probably something very hard to find.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Yeah. Looks like your shine is very shy. We should do our best to keep looking for it!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: A shy shine?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: A pun, now of all times, zura?!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Oh, what have I done? You can laugh, you know!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: It's not even funny!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I...I thought you were all shining brilliantly!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: From prep to clean up, and especially during the live show.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You looked like you were shining as bright as the sun, the whole time.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: So we were shining, huh. Oh, that gets me! We didn't even notice ourselves! That's so unfair!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: S-Sorry?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: You don't need to apologize. However, this does prove that our audience can feel something we don't understand.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Maybe you're right. We seem to have been shining, so maybe we're getting closer to noticing it.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Hmm... Tell us just how we were shining!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I mean, I just said you were like the sun, so bright.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Explain it a little more concretely! Details, please.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Seriously?!
